au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=10m_L2=1p3m_offset_apx10
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(510,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g4 driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 37.9225) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.1953)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(45, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(49.5, 0) driveBsz(262.5)
